name: Obey || Obey
description:
OBEY || OBEY
University project on creating a Java game using Android Studio.

Does your mother always tell you what you have to do? Clean the dishes! Stop playing games! Clean your room!
... Well ... this game is all about doing your damn chores! Of course,  your chores here have nothing to do with the real life, but at least they are as annoying as they come.

Goal:
Get the best time and share it with friends by finishing all mini games as fast as humanly possible! Then do it again and again until your mother comes and asks you to stop playing.
